 void configure(java.awt.Graphics2D g)

Field Detail

DEFAULT

static final Style DEFAULT
The default style. Can be used to normalize a graphics context after application of another style.

Method Detail

configure

void configure(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
Applies style's settings to the parameter graphics context, so that it is ready for painting.

Parameters:
g - graphics context to configure
